articles.description: Christmas is very different this year, but celebrities are managing to keep a smile on their fans' faces as they share festive snaps from their homes - from the Beckham family to the Kardashians - here's a look at what the stars are getting up to today
articles.content:
It's been an incredibly tough year after the coronavirus pandemic brought 2020 to a complete standstill with more than one lockdown. 
But with tough restrictions in place, many of us are unable to s… [+8825 chars]
